Privacy Policy

Last Updated: February 2025

1. Information Collection

We collect minimal information necessary for site functionality:

  • Browser type and version
  • Access timestamps
  • Referring websites

2. Use of Information

Information collected is used solely for:

  • Website optimization
  • Security monitoring
  • Analytics purposes

3. Data Protection

We implement various security measures to maintain data safety:

  • SSL encryption
  • Regular security audits
  • Limited data retention

4. Third-Party Services

Our site may use third-party services for:

  • Analytics tracking
  • Performance monitoring
  • Security features

5. User Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access your data
  • Request data deletion
  • Opt-out of tracking

6. Contact Information

For privacy-related inquiries, contact us through our contact page.
